messages.BAD_LOCATION: The location co-ordinates do not follow the correct format: [Longitude, Latitude] Valid longitude values are between -180 and 180. Valid latitude values are between -90 and 90 (both inclusive).
messages.UNHANDLED_MONGO: An internal mongo server error occurred
messages.UNHANDLED_MONGOOSE: An internal mongoose server error occurred

auth.WRONGUSERORPW: username / password combination do not exist
